title: Spiderverse!!!
author: Akash Kumar
content: There was idea to bring together a group of remarkable people... three spidermen! The lineup for MCU's to-be-titled Spider-Man 3 is looking CRAZY. Jamie Foxx is returning as Electro, Doctor Strange will be included, and now Tobey Macguire and Andrew Garfield are rumored to reprise their roles as Spider-Man in the MCU, joining current Spider-Man Tom Holland.

title: WandaVision Leak
author: Akash Kumar
content: From WandaVision's trailer, we know that Scarlet Witch is living inside an alternate reality bubble where Vision is still alive, but it looks like the prospect of Marvel multiverse is growing (not to mention the rumors of a Spider-Verse). It is now rumored, by Serlent Pops, that Quicksilver, Wanda's brother will be making an appearance in the much anticipated Disney+ show.
